title: Blessing Your Spouse in Simple Ways
itunes:author: Guest: Kathi Lipp
itunes:summary: Making your spouse feel loved never happens by accident. It requires paying attention and doing something to bless him or her. John, Greg and Erin explain how they've learned to love their spouse through simple actions. Receive the book Happy Habits for Every Couple with your gift of any amount!
